basics.name: Andreas Biberacher
basics.label: Bridge between Business and IT || Software Modernization | Data Engineering | Cloud Computing | Cybersecurity & Risk Management | Agile Leadership (改善) ||
basics.summary:
I'm a passionate Tech Lead with broad knowledge in Cloud Computing, Data Engineering, Cybersecurity, and Legacy Modernization. With a strong focus on delivering reliable and value-centric solutions, I thrive in an environment where quality and continuous improvement are paramount.

I embody a hands-on mentality, leading by example to inspire and motivate my team. My experience in team development enables me to guide cross-functional groups towards success, fostering collaboration, and delivering reliable results.

I have a deep understanding of Cloud Computing, leveraging its vast potential to architect secure and scalable systems. I stay at the forefront of emerging technologies and industry trends, proactively identifying and mitigating potential cybersecurity risks to safeguard critical data assets.

Beyond my technical expertise, I am dedicated to social engagement and giving back to the community. I actively contribute to open-source projects and love to share knowledge (tech talks, mentoring, lectureships at universities), as well as collaborating with like-minded professionals to drive innovation and foster collective growth.

Here are some key highlights of my background:

• Proven track record as a Tech Lead, successfully delivering complex projects and business objectives.
• Extensive experience in cloud-based solutions, especially in designing and executing multi-cloud and edge-computing strategies with Kubernetes.
• Deep knowledge of cybersecurity principles, implementing robust measures during the software development process and in the cloud to protect sensitive information.
• Proficient in data engineering, utilizing distributed data processing (Apache Spark, Kafka) to extract valuable insights and drive informed decision-making.
• Specialized in the topic of application modernization from COBOL/Mainframe to Java/Cloud.
• Audience-centered communication skills to include stakeholders (developers, business experts, C-level, and external customers) in decision-making processes.
• A leader, fostering a culture of innovation, collaboration, and growth within cross-functional teams.

To sum it up, I am the bridge between management, stakeholders, and the engine room. With my in-depth technical and leadership expertise, I navigate through the complexity of a VUCA-driven landscape, constantly maintaining an overview. By building and involving cross-functional teams, I turn my knowledge into reliable and value-creating solutions, starting from day one.

Let's connect and explore ways we can Let's connect and explore ways we can prosper together.

work.name: T-Systems on site services GmbH
work.summary:
Scope: Integrating of an IoT system for automated drone detection and pilot localization for KRITIS infrastructure
Sector: Public & Defence

Main Responsibilities: 
• Overall responsibility for the software and platform architecture with a focus on low latency data streaming
• Quality assurance (privacy & security audits, integration testing, regulatory compliance)
• Presales and face to the customer for technical topics

Tech Stack: Websocket, Edge Computing, C2-integration, IoT, RF, 5G, DevSecOps

work.name: T-Systems on site services GmbH
work.summary:
Scope: Building a self-contained team that is able to tackle the external market in the sectors public and defence.

Main Responsibilities:
• Chapter Lead of ~15 Developers and Cloud Consultants
• Development and execution of a go-to-market strategy
• (Pre-)Sales activities and stakeholder communication
• Deal negotiation of work and service contracts
• Guild Lead of the Cloud & IoT Guild

work.name: T-Systems on site services GmbH
work.summary:
Scope: Elaboration of an interface modernization and standardization strategy for a mainframe-based, mission-critical product data system of a large automotive company.

Main Responsibilities:
• Assessment of existing mainframe based system interfaces and middleware components
• Re-architecting of high demand system modules by decoupling interfaces from the application core
• Standardizing interfaces based on the technologies REST and Apache Kafka
• Designing an event-based data streaming process for business objects to a centralized Data Mesh via Apache Spark
• Representation of company interests in customer architecture boards
• Project management and team coordination (local, nearshore, and offshore)

Tech Stack: Java, Spring, Kubernetes, Azure, AWS, REST, Apache Kafka, Apache Spark, Mainframe, WebSphere, COBOL, SOAP, CICS, SFTP, IBM MQ, IMS, DB2,  Apache Cassandra, PostgreSQL, arc42, risk management, threat modelling, DevSecOps

work.name: T-Systems on site services GmbH
work.summary:
Scope: Development of a Minimum Viable Product (MVP) to modernize interfaces of a mainframe-based, mission-critical product data system of a large automotive company.

Main Responsibilities:
• Development of scalable and maintainable RESTful services
• Asynchronous data provisioning with Apache Kafka
• System performance testing
• Automation of Monitoring and CI/CD (incl. quality gates)

Tech Stack: Java, Spring, REST, Apache Kafka, Openshift, PostgreSQL, Gatling, Jenkins, Grafana, Prometheus

work.name: Biberacher IT-Solutions
work.summary:
Scope: Full stack software development and management consulting for small and medium-sized companies in the sectors Healthcare, Finance, and Marketing.

Project #1: Digital doctor's office
Project Scope: Digitization and automation of processes in medical practices
Sector: Healthcare
Tasks:
• Development of an application for automated reading, analysis, and visualization of mobile sleep laboratories and long-term ECGs
• Development of an application for automated digitization (OCR scanning) and archiving of patient reports to reduce manual data entry steps
• Consultation for ERP systems for medium-sized practices and laboratories

Project #2: Real estate market screening
Project Scope: Identification of historically undervalued commercial properties
Sector: Real Estate
Tasks:
• Data Mining on different data dimensions (e.g. real estate price, standard land value (GIS), insurance claims)
• Developing product metrics (KPIs) in cooperation with the subject-matter expert
• Configuration of automated monitoring and alerting

Project #3: Web Development
Project Scope: Development and maintenance of company websites
Sector: eCommerce
Tasks:
• Security audit of websites based on the OWASP Top 10 security vulnerabilities
• Creating a website for ticket sales for community events with Angular
• Creating websites with a focus on ease of use and low maintenance with WordPress

Tech Stack: Java, Python, Angular, PostgreSQL, Prometheus, Grafana, Jenkins, Linux

work.name: QUANTO Solutions
work.summary:
Title: IT security in microservice-based systems - From monolith to a secure cloud-native application

Key findings:
• Microservices have a broader attack surface compared to monolithic architectures. On the other hand, they offer new potentials to achieve high availability and attack mitigation by a defense-in-depth approach instead of pure perimeter defense.
• The API-Gateway and Service Registry are critical components in a microservice architecture and must be protected against specific (e.g., service spoofing, DNS/config poisoning, feigned health status), as well as generic (OWASP Top10, DDoS, MITM) attacks.
• Security audits using NIST CSF and ISO/IEC 27001 help identify and prioritize risks and address them through measures like circuit breakers, single-service-per-host policies, and container isolation.

Tech Stack: Java, Java EE, Spring, Docker, Cloud Foundry (SAP), AWS, MS Azure, Openshift, Jenkins

volunteer.summary:
Scope: Volunteer mentor at Groundbreaker gGmbH's mentoring program for women in tech.
The one-year mentoring program aims to provide career starters with the tools they need to enter the world of software engineering.

• Software engineering basic and advanced concepts
• Career development paths
